sentence.Network_en: The argument about " conceding " numerical inequality was due either to a misunderstanding or to demagoguery.
sentence.Network_cn: 所谓我们 “ 承认 ” 了数量的不平等,这不是出于误解就是想蛊惑人心.

sentence.Network_en: And, yes, this is an emotional question and one that lends itself to demagoguery.
sentence.Network_cn: 是的, 这是一个情绪化的问题,很容易被蛊惑人心者利用.
